document_data.caption: Akota to the west beyond Zakhara.
document_data.name: Akota
document_data.mainbody: '''Akota''' was a mysterious country somewhere beyond the western shores of [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Activities:
Akota exported [[gold]], [[slave]]s, wood, and exotic goods to the Land of Fate through the [[Akota (city)|city of Akota]] to the city of [[Tajar]].<ref>{{Cite interactive atlas|?}}

It had its own language called [[Akotan]], which was also spoken in Zakhara's western settlements that were conducting trade with exotic Akota.
